game.title: Tetris
game.synopsis: In Tetris, the goal is to clear the playfield by forming complete rows of multicolored Tetrominoes. The game ends when the playfield is cleared.
game.beginning: You are playing the classic video game Tetris in an old DOS emulator. It is the 1990s and you are attempting to clear the square block pile on the playfield by correctly orienting Tetriminos into rows.
game.ending: The game ends after you succeed in clearing the playfield. You achieve a high score and exit the emulator to take a break from your programming assignment.
